item.title: The Adventure of the Missing Syscall: Error 38
item.description: Sherlock Holmes tackles a modern computing dilemma involving a missing system call. In this case, a frustrated developer attempts to port an embedded device running Yocto to a newer version, only to be met with `Error 38` due to a missing syscall. Holmes and Watson delve into the intricacies of kernel versions, glibc, and system calls to uncover the truth behind the missing `syscall_397` and provide a logical solution.
